start.content:
#!/bin/sh
PID_FILE=/var/run/engines/gitea.pid

export PID_FILE

. /home/engines/functions/trap.sh

cd /home/app
./gitea -P $PID_FILE web
startup_complete
wait
shutdown_complete

template_files.content:
;
APP_NAME = Gitea: Git with a cup of tea
RUN_USER = www-data
RUN_MODE = prod


[repository]
ROOT = /home/fs/repo/gitea-repositories

[server]

SSH_DOMAIN       = _Engines_Builder(fqdn)
DOMAIN           = _Engines_Builder(fqdn)
HTTP_PORT        = 3000
DISABLE_SSH      = false
SSH_PORT         = 22
LFS_START_SERVER = true
LFS_CONTENT_PATH = /home/fs/repo/data/lfs
LFS_JWT_SECRET   = _Engines_System(random(32))
OFFLINE_MODE     = false
ROOT_URL = https://_Engines_Builder(fqdn)/

;database
[database]
DB_TYPE = mysql
HOST = _Engines_Environment(dbhost):3306
NAME = _Engines_Environment(dbname)
USER = _Engines_Environment(dbuser)
PASSWD = _Engines_Environment(dbpasswd)
SSL_MODE = disable

;Security
[security]
SECRET_KEY = _Engines_System(random(32))
INTERNAL_TOKEN = _Engines_System(random(30))


;mailer
[mailer]
ENABLED = true
HOST = smtp.engines.internal
FROM = <gitea@_Engines_Builder(fqdn)>
PORT = 25


;log
[log]
ROOT_PATH = /var/log
MODE      = file
LEVEL     = Info


[cron]
; Enable running cron tasks periodically handled by cron service
ENABLED = false

[service]
REGISTER_EMAIL_CONFIRM            = true
ENABLE_NOTIFY_MAIL                = false
DISABLE_REGISTRATION              = true
ALLOW_ONLY_EXTERNAL_REGISTRATION  = false
ENABLE_CAPTCHA                    = false
REQUIRE_SIGNIN_VIEW               = false
DEFAULT_KEEP_EMAIL_PRIVATE        = false
DEFAULT_ALLOW_CREATE_ORGANIZATION = true
DEFAULT_ENABLE_TIMETRACKING       = true
NO_REPLY_ADDRESS                  = <noreply@_Engines_Builder(fqdn)>
